on reading compounds: 鎧袖一触【ガイシュウイッショク】(beating someone) hands down, with a single blow
kun reading compounds: 鎧う【よろう】to put on armour (armor), to wear armour, to arm oneself, to wear, to cover
鎧板【よろいいた】louver slat, louvre slat
馬鎧【うまよろい】horse armor, horse armour
板金鎧【ばんきんよろい】plate armor, plate armour
